articles.title: U.S. may act alone to ban Russian oil imports, sources say - Reuters.com
articles.description: The United States is willing to move ahead with a ban on Russian oil imports without the participation of allies in Europe, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters, in light of Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

articles.title: Oil soars, stocks fall on Russia crude ban talk - news.com.au
articles.description: Stock markets lost ground while metal prices hit record highs and oil surged on Monday after the United States raised the prospect of an embargo on Russian crude over its invasion of Ukraine -- a move on which Europe urged severe caution.
